java/liquibase/ant/DiffDatabaseTask.java

00001 package liquibase.ant;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.diff.Diff;
00005 import liquibase.diff.DiffResult;
00006 import liquibase.Liquibase;
00007 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00008 import org.apache.tools.ant.BuildException;
00009 
00010 import java.io.PrintStream;
00011 
00012 public class DiffDatabaseTask extends BaseLiquibaseTask {
00013 
00014     private String baseDriver;
00015     private String baseUrl;
00016     private String baseUsername;
00017     private String basePassword;
00018     private String baseDefaultSchemaName;
00019 
00020     public String getBaseDriver() {
00021         if (baseDriver == null) {
00022             return getDriver();
00023         }
00024         return baseDriver;
00025     }
00026 
00027     public void setBaseDriver(String baseDriver) {
00028         this.baseDriver = baseDriver;
00029     }
00030 
00031     public String getBaseUrl() {
00032         return baseUrl;
00033     }
00034 
00035     public void setBaseUrl(String baseUrl) {
00036         this.baseUrl = baseUrl;
00037     }
00038 
00039     public String getBaseUsername() {
00040         return baseUsername;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public void setBaseUsername(String baseUsername) {
00044         this.baseUsername = baseUsername;
00045     }
00046 
00047     public String getBasePassword() {
00048         return basePassword;
00049     }
00050 
00051     public void setBasePassword(String basePassword) {
00052         this.basePassword = basePassword;
00053     }
00054 
00055     public String getBaseDefaultSchemaName() {
00056         return baseDefaultSchemaName;
00057     }
00058 
00059     public void setBaseDefaultSchemaName(String baseDefaultSchemaName) {
00060         this.baseDefaultSchemaName = baseDefaultSchemaName;
00061     }
00062 
00063     public void execute() throws BuildException {
00064         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(getBaseUrl()) == null) {
00065             throw new BuildException("diffDatabase requires baseUrl to be set");
00066         }
00067         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(getBaseUsername()) == null) {
00068             throw new BuildException("diffDatabase requires baseUsername to be set");
00069         }
00070         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(getBasePassword()) == null) {
00071             throw new BuildException("diffDatabase requires basePassword to be set");
00072         }
00073         
00074         Liquibase liquibase = null;
00075         try {
00076             PrintStream writer = createPrintStream();
00077             if (writer == null) {
00078                 throw new BuildException("diffDatabase requires outputFile to be set");
00079             }
00080 
00081             liquibase = createLiquibase();
00082 
00083             Database baseDatabase = createDatabaseObject(getBaseDriver(), getBaseUrl(), getBaseUsername(), getBasePassword(), getBaseDefaultSchemaName());
00084 
00085 
00086             Diff diff = new Diff(baseDatabase, liquibase.getDatabase());
00087 //            diff.addStatusListener(new OutDiffStatusListener());
00088             DiffResult diffResult = diff.compare();
00089 
00090             outputDiff(writer, diffResult, liquibase.getDatabase());
00091 
00092             writer.flush();
00093             writer.close();
00094         } catch (Exception e) {
00095             throw new BuildException(e);
00096         } finally {
00097             closeDatabase(liquibase);
00098         }
00099     }
00100 
00101     protected void outputDiff(PrintStream writer, DiffResult diffResult, Database targetDatabase) throws Exception {
00102         diffResult.printResult(writer);
00103     }
00104 }
